description:
Very easy and simple.
Dosen't do much and doesn't have a save option or a logo (just plane) but you just need to select the flies that you want to play and there you go!

I could navigate to my folder, clicked on OK, went back to the main screen and .... nothing. Clicking on the main screen showed the filename of the first file in the folder, but nothing happened.
Ubuntu 20.04 using Unity desktop
Would really have liked it if it offered the option to use the full screen.
summary: Simple program and it is ok..
